alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:29AM CST until February 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Monticello. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water begins to flood lower portions of Cooper`s Ferry Park in Monticello. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Monticello 22.0 25.0 Sun 9 am CST 24.7 23.9 22.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CST.
